title: Generate your GitLab year-in-review wrapped report automatically
description: GITLAB WRAPPED GENERATOR‚ú® Automatically generate your personalized GitLab Wrapped, a stunningyear-in-review of your contributions, activity, and stats.Powered by gitlab-wrapped[https://gitlab.com/michaelangelorivera/gitlab-wrapped] by @michaelangelorivera[https://gitlab.com/michaelangelorivera].üöÄ HOW IT WORKS 1. Forks the gitlab-wrapped project (or finds your existing fork) 2. Configures CI/CD environment variables 3. Triggers the GitLab pipeline 4. Monitors until completion (polls every 2 minutes)üéâ Your wrapped will be available at:https://YOUR-USERNAME.gitlab.io/gitlab-wrapped--------------------------------------------------------------------------------‚öôÔ∏è SETUP 1. Create a GitLab PAT with these scopes: * api * read_repository * write_repository 2. Submit & relax! ‚òï The workflow handles everything automatically.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------üí° Works with GitLab.com [http://GitLab.com] and self-hosted instancesüìÖ Generate wrapped reports for any past year
metadescription: Generate a personalized GitLab Wrapped year-in-review‚Äîauto-fork, run CI/CD, and publish shareable stats for GitLab.com or self-hosted.
summary:
Turn your GitLab year into a shareable ‚ÄúWrapped‚Äù packed with contribution stats and activity highlights.  
Auto-fork (or reuse) the gitlab-wrapped project by @michaelangelorivera and set required CI/CD variables.  
Kick off the GitLab pipeline, then monitor progress with 2‚Äëminute polling until it finishes.  
Publish instantly to `https://YOUR-USERNAME.gitlab.io/gitlab-wrapped`.  
Simple setup: provide username, GitLab PAT (api/read_repository/write_repository), instance URL, and year (default 2025).  
Compatible with GitLab.com and self-hosted‚Äîgenerate reports for any past year.
